name: leopoldo-plugins
description: Custom Claude Code plugins for productivity, project management, and workflow automation

plugins.name: clickup
plugins.description: Full ClickUp API integration via direct curl. 100+ endpoints without MCP dependency: tasks, time tracking, docs, comments, custom fields, and more. Per-project config via .claude/clickup.local.md.

plugins.name: adr-sync
plugins.description: Automatic ADR consistency management. Detects ADR creation/modification, cross-references against project docs, updates all affected files, and tracks sync status with frontmatter flags. Includes PostToolUse hook, autonomous sync agent, manual review command, and passive architecture knowledge skill.
